caption: Mesh! is HTXs platform for engaging our network of partners and providing an opportunity to foster stronger collaborations, to advance science and technology for public safety. This year, we brought together 400 guests from 190 organisations, including government, industry, academia, foreign missions, and start-ups. We were honoured to have Mr Edwin Tong, Minister for Law and Second Minister for Home Affairs, grace the occasion.HTX is committed to building a vibrant ecosystem that bridges the public and private sectors across the entire innovation value chain.We aim to make an impact, together.HTXsg
cleaned_caption: Mesh! is HTXs platform for engaging our network of partners and providing an opportunity to foster stronger collaborations, to advance science and technology for public safety. This year, we brought together 400 guests from 190 organisations, including government, industry, academia, foreign missions, and start-ups. We were honoured to have the Minister for Law and Second Minister for Home Affairs grace the occasion. HTX is committed to building a vibrant ecosystem that bridges the public and private sectors across the entire innovation value chain. We aim to make an impact, together. HTXsg

caption: Today, over 1,700 Xponents gathered for our annual HTX Convention with an energetic rallying cry: Score Big, Dream Bigger, Together!We kicked off on a high, setting the tone for a day of bold ideas and shared purpose then discussed how we plan to tackle tomorrows challenges together.From inspiring speeches by CE Chan Tsan and our Home Team leaders, to showcases of smart, autonomous systems (yeslive robots!), the Convention spotlighted how were accelerating tech deployment across the Home Team.We also announced new initiatives like the HTX Chat Bot, our AI push, and how HTSC and xCode are building agility and resilience.And of course, we celebrated the incredible efforts of fellow Xponents with the HTX Awards. Heres to shaping public safety and security together as One HTX.HTXsg HTXConvention
cleaned_caption: Today, over 1,700 Xponents gathered for our annual HTX Convention with an energetic rallying cry: Score Big, Dream Bigger, Together! We kicked off on a high, setting the tone for a day of bold ideas and shared purpose then discussed how we plan to tackle tomorrow's challenges together. From inspiring speeches by CE and our Home Team leaders, to showcases of smart, autonomous systems (yes live robots!), the Convention spotlighted how we're accelerating tech deployment across the Home Team. We also announced new initiatives like the HTX Chat Bot, our AI push, and how HTSC and xCode are building agility and resilience. And of course, we celebrated the incredible efforts of fellow Xponents with the HTX Awards. Here's to shaping public safety and security together as One HTX. HTXsg HTXConvention

caption: Congratulations to Xponents from our xCyber division for their impressive performance at the recent DEF CON 32 "Capture the Flag" (CTF) competitions: 3rd in the Adversary Village and 5th in the Red Team Village!This showing at HTXs first DEF CON participation highlights our commitment to developing deep cyber capabilities in order to secure Singapore future, and validates our engineers abilities to safeguard critical Home Team systems.DEF CON is recognised by the international cybersecurity community as a top global gathering of ethical hackers. Each DEF CON village - including Adversary, Red Team, AI, IoT and Cloud - hosts its own CTF competition. In these white hat hacking events, skilled cybersecurity experts demonstrate their skill by uncovering hidden "flags" within intentionally vulnerable programs.HTXsg HTScienceandTech Cybersecurity DEFCON DEFCON32
cleaned_caption: Congratulations to Xponents from our xCyber division for their impressive performance at the recent DEF CON 32 "Capture the Flag" (CTF) competitions: 3rd in the Adversary Village and 5th in the Red Team Village! This showing at HTX's first DEF CON participation highlights our commitment to developing deep cyber capabilities in order to secure Singapore's future, and validates our engineers' abilities to safeguard critical Home Team systems. DEF CON is recognised by the international cybersecurity community as a top global gathering of ethical hackers. Each DEF CON village - including Adversary, Red Team, AI, IoT and Cloud - hosts its own CTF competition. In these white hat hacking events, skilled cybersecurity experts demonstrate their skill by uncovering hidden "flags" within intentionally vulnerable programs. HTXsg HTScienceandTech Cybersecurity DEFCON DEFCON32

caption: Last Friday, more than 1400 Xponents gathered for our annual HTX Convention. We recollected and celebrated our journey and growth together in the past four and a half years, and gained insights on core strategies for the future. These include harnessing AI as a game changer, as well as other novel ways of deepening skills and expertise to augment our Home Team operations to tackle homeland security threats. We also showed appreciation and recognition to 300+ Xponents for their valuable contributions in the past year! Heres to more collaborations, innovations and riding the next wave together, hand in hand! HTXsg HTScienceandTech HTXConvention
cleaned_caption: Last Friday, more than 1400 Xponents gathered for our annual HTX Convention. We recollected and celebrated our journey and growth together in the past four and a half years, and gained insights on core strategies for the future. These include harnessing AI as a game changer, as well as other novel ways of deepening skills and expertise to augment our Home Team operations to tackle homeland security threats. We also showed appreciation and recognition to 300+ Xponents for their valuable contributions in the past year! Here's to more collaborations, innovations and riding the next wave together, hand in hand! HTXsg HTScienceandTech HTXConvention

caption: Happy StarWarsDay! The Force Awakenswith our Science and Tech, which we harness to augment our Home Teams operations so as to keep Singapore safe and secure.May the 4th be with you! Learn more about the featured tech here:Rover-X: go.gov.sg/roverxAperture: go.gov.sg/aperture-smSolving Crimes: go.gov.sg/solvingcrimes HTXsg HTScienceandTech StarWars MayThe4th MayThe4thBeWithYou
cleaned_caption: Happy StarWarsDay! The Force Awakens with our Science and Tech, which we harness to augment our Home Teams operations so as to keep Singapore safe and secure. May the 4th be with you! Learn more about the featured tech here: Rover-X: go.gov.sg/roverx Aperture: go.gov.sg/aperture-sm Solving Crimes: go.gov.sg/solvingcrimes HTXsg HTScienceandTech StarWars MayThe4th MayThe4thBeWithYou

caption: Its a wrap for the inaugural Milipol Asia-Pacific - TechX Summit 2024 that was held in Singapore last week!There were meaningful partnerships forged, and fruitful discussions on how science and technologies like AI can be harnessed to overcome homeland security operational challenges. The strong participation at AI-CTF and great reception of innovations exhibited at HTX Pavilion demonstrate the excellence we can achieve with industry, academia and government leaders from the international homeland security community.We are pleased that MAP-TXS was such a resounding success! Kudos to Xponents who worked hard behind the scenes to make it all happen HTXsg HTScienceandTech TXS2024 Milipol2024
cleaned_caption: Its a wrap for the inaugural Milipol Asia-Pacific - TechX Summit 2024 that was held in Singapore last week! There were meaningful partnerships forged, and fruitful discussions on how science and technologies like AI can be harnessed to overcome homeland security operational challenges. The strong participation at AI-CTF and great reception of innovations exhibited at HTX Pavilion demonstrate the excellence we can achieve with industry, academia and government leaders from the international homeland security community. We are pleased that MAP-TXS was such a resounding success! Kudos to those who worked hard behind the scenes to make it all happen.

caption: HTXs innovation centre for public safety and security, Hatch, is the official innovation hub partner for The Big Spark, a brand-new reality TV series premiering on CNA tonight at 7pm to uncover the next big start-up, which will walk away with up to $1 million in seed funding. Together with partners, judges and contestants, we were treated to an exclusive sneak peek of the first episode of the show recently. Our Chief Executive, Mr Chan Tsan, sent his congratulations and highlighted Hatchs role in harnessing technologies from global start-ups for better Home Team operations.Dont forget to catch the first episode tonight!HTXsg HTXHatch Hatch Innovation TheBigSpark SparkBigDreams
cleaned_caption: HTXs innovation centre for public safety and security, Hatch, is the official innovation hub partner for The Big Spark, a brand-new reality TV series premiering on CNA tonight at 7pm to uncover the next big start-up, which will walk away with up to $1 million in seed funding. Together with partners, judges and contestants, we were treated to an exclusive sneak peek of the first episode of the show recently. Our Chief Executive sent his congratulations and highlighted Hatch's role in harnessing technologies from global start-ups for better Home Team operations. Don't forget to catch the first episode tonight! HTXsg HTXHatch Hatch Innovation TheBigSpark SparkBigDreams

caption: Thats a wrap for Milipol Paris 2023, the largest Homeland Security exhibition in the world! It has been an eventful 3.5 days engaging over 2,000 visitors from around the globe at our SG Pavilion. Together with our partners, , and , we had the privilege of receiving the France Minister of Interior Grald Darmanin, Ivory Coast Interior Minister Vagondo Diomand, and our very own Minister of Home Affairs K Shanmugam. We were also joined by our Chairman, Aubeck Kam, who's concurrently the PS (Home Affairs Development), and the Commissioners of , and on this first-of-its-kind overseas mission. Thank you to the entire team of Xponents who worked tirelessly to make this event a success, both in Paris and Singapore! We'll see you next year at MAP-TXS 2024. Read more via link in bio.HTXsg MilipolParis2023

Thank you to the entire team of Xponents who worked tirelessly to make this event a success, both in Paris and Singapore! We'll see you next year at MAP-TXS 2024. Read more via link in bio.

caption: Milipol Paris 2023 has officially commenced! Heres a glimpse at yesterdays set-up, where our HTX team, as well as our partners ( ), gave the Chairman of HTX, concurrently Permanent Secretary (Home Affairs Development) of the , Mr Aubeck Kam, a hearty welcome on his preview visit. Today, everyone is in high spirits and all geared up to put on our best show for the next four days. Stay tuned for more updates from Paris! HTXsg HTScienceandTech MilipolParis

Today, everyone is in high spirits and all geared up to put on our best show for the next four days. Stay tuned for more updates from Paris! HTXsg HTScienceandTech MilipolParis

caption: Our inspiring leaders united for a shared purpose today at the Women in HTX event. Many of them shared their personal stories to raise awareness about the importance of fostering gender inclusion and diversity in the workplace. They also talked about the many initiatives existing and upcoming that HTX has in place to make sure that women, who are usually underrepresented in the STEM industry, can be better supported at work. Were committed to this movement because brilliance knows no bounds.HTXsg ScienceandTech WomeninSTEM genderequality genderequity
cleaned_caption: Our inspiring leaders united for a shared purpose today at the Women in HTX event. We're committed to this movement because brilliance knows no bounds. HTX Science and Tech Women in STEM gender equality gender equity

caption: Weapons of mass destruction may sound like they only exist in our Wildest Dreams, but our CBRNE* scientists know All Too Well that these silent threats can pose a serious risk to public safety.Anomalies in the air? I Knew You Were Trouble. Lavender Haze sighted? We cant just Shake It Off.Our team of CBRNE scientists develop cutting-edge technologies and work tirelessly at our network of checkpoint laboratories to ly detect and intercept unsuspecting threats from crossing our borders.* , , , , iykyk HTScienceandTech HTXsg
cleaned_caption: Weapons of mass destruction may sound like they only exist in our Wildest Dreams, but our CBRNE scientists know all too well that these silent threats can pose a serious risk to public safety. Anomalies in the air? Our team of CBRNE scientists develop cutting-edge technologies and work tirelessly at our network of checkpoint laboratories to detect and intercept unsuspecting threats from crossing our borders.

caption: Congratulations to the finalists and winners of this years robotics competition! Since its inauguration in 2021, Ive witnessed how much the event has grown. Im heartened to see the students from NTU coming together every year to organise this event in hopes to carry their enthusiasm for robotics to the next generation of engineering talents. shared Cheng Wee Kiang, Director of HTXs Robotics, Automation and Unmanned Systems CoE, who once again graced the event finals as the Guest-of-Honor and presented the prizes to the winners.HTXsg HTScienceandTech Robotics
cleaned_caption: Congratulations to the finalists and winners of this year's robotics competition! Since its inauguration in 2021, I've witnessed how much the event has grown. I'm heartened to see the students from NTU coming together every year to organise this event in hopes to carry their enthusiasm for robotics to the next generation of engineering talents, shared the Director of HTX's Robotics, Automation and Unmanned Systems CoE, who once again graced the event finals as the Guest-of-Honor and presented the prizes to the winners. HTXsg HTScienceandTech Robotics

caption: Feeling the Monday blues? Here are some blues that just hit different - from air, to land and sea, we harness S&T to innovate solutions that enhance Singapores safety and security. So as you head home today, take some respite in the safe journey home. Our engineers and scientists are always working hard behind the scenes so you can have that peace of mind HTXsg HTScienceandTech
cleaned_caption: Feeling the Monday blues? Here are some blues that just hit different - from air, to land and sea, we harness S&T to innovate solutions that enhance Singapore's safety and security. So as you head home today, take some respite in the safe journey home. Our engineers and scientists are always working hard behind the scenes so you can have that peace of mind.

caption: A picture is worth a thousand words, a video is worth even more - we can now share direct video streams from our mobile phones during emergency calls This is made possible with the Emergency Video System (EVS) which was jointly launched last week by SPF, SCDF and HTX. Various HTX divisions were involved to offer their expertise, including the Policing and Civil Defence Programme Management Centres (PMCs) and xCloud.The biggest challenge was in ensuring the system operates in a secured landscape while making it convenient for officers and callers. shared Serene Tan, an engineer from HTXs Policing PMC.Learn more about the EVS via the link in bio HTXsg HTScienceandTech
cleaned_caption: A picture is worth a thousand words, a video is worth even more - we can now share direct video streams from our mobile phones during emergency calls. This is made possible with the Emergency Video System (EVS) which was jointly launched last week by Singapore Police Force (SPF), Singapore Civil Defence Force (SCDF) and Home Team Science and Technology Agency (HTX). Various HTX divisions were involved to offer their expertise, including the Policing and Civil Defence Programme Management Centres (PMCs) and xCloud. The biggest challenge was in ensuring the system operates in a secured landscape while making it convenient for officers and callers, shared an engineer from HTX's Policing PMC. Learn more about the EVS via the link in bio.

caption: We recently had the pleasure of hosting Dr. Dimitri Kusnezov, Under Secretary for Science and Technology, U.S. Department of Homeland Security Science and Technology Directorate, and his colleagues, where we showcased our latest innovations and breakthroughs for the Home Team. We are thrilled that our guests were impressed by our teams expertise and passion for pushing the boundaries to tackle challenges in homeland security. We are also grateful for the opportunity to share our vision with our esteemed guests and look forward to continuing our mission to make a positive impact on Singapores safety and security through science and technology. Stay tuned for more updates on our groundbreaking work!HTXsgHTScienceandTechInnovationpushingboundaries
cleaned_caption: We recently had the pleasure of hosting the Under Secretary for Science and Technology, U.S. Department of Homeland Security Science and Technology Directorate, and his colleagues, where we showcased our latest innovations and breakthroughs for the Home Team. We are thrilled that our guests were impressed by our teams expertise and passion for pushing the boundaries to tackle challenges in homeland security. We are also grateful for the opportunity to share our vision with our esteemed guests and look forward to continuing our mission to make a positive impact on Singapore's safety and security through science and technology. Stay tuned for more updates on our groundbreaking work!

caption: We are grateful to receive the Public Sector Transformation (PST) Exemplary Innovator Award alongside , , and .sg! This award for the multi-agency collaboration recognises the innovative work that went into developing OMNII, a transformative digital platform that allows SCDF and hospitals to work together in an integrated manner so as to enhance the delivery of emergency medical services. Future phases of OMNII may include biometric authentication to identify patients and cloud-based AI technology for more intelligent operations and clinical treatment. OMNII is a great testament of a multi-agency, cross-ministry project that embraces technology to bring about higher efficiency and better outcomes for both users and the people we serve, said Ling Kok Yong, Director, HTXs Civil Defence Programme Management Centre (CDPMC). Find out more about OMNII via the link in bio
cleaned_caption: We are grateful to receive the Public Sector Transformation (PST) Exemplary Innovator Award alongside others! This award for the multi-agency collaboration recognises the innovative work that went into developing OMNII, a transformative digital platform that allows SCDF and hospitals to work together in an integrated manner to enhance the delivery of emergency medical services. Future phases of OMNII may include biometric authentication to identify patients and cloud-based AI technology for more intelligent operations and clinical treatment. OMNII is a great testament of a multi-agency, cross-ministry project that embraces technology to bring about higher efficiency and better outcomes for both users and the people we serve, said Director, HTXs Civil Defence Programme Management Centre (CDPMC). Find out more about OMNII via the link in bio.

caption: If youve seen our post (bit.ly/cicwinner2019 - link in bio) on the winner of CIC 2019, heres Zhen Hao () giving us an update and sharing with us his experience on attending the RSA Conference 2020 in San Francisco last weekOur future intern said he had an eye-opening and mind-blowing experience, gaining new perspectives on the current security challenges from the expert-led sessions and keynotes. He stated that it was like a step into the future with countless exhibitions and each of them showcasing cutting-edge technologies that are not on the market, and solutions that were previously thought impossible to create. Another highlight he mentioned was meeting some of the creators of RSA up-close at the conference!Zhen Hao was thrilled to broaden his horizons by attending the physical workshops and trying car hacking and radio frequency (RF) hacking. He successfully manipulated the electronic device in the car such as the speedometer, door locks, starting the car and even deploying the airbags. He thoroughly enjoyed the hands-on experience of compromising a system as such an attack was only theoretically taught in school.It appears that Zhen Haos all-expense-paid trip has been most rewarding for him. CIC 2020 is happening again on 13-14 July this year! For those interested to join, look out for more details of enrolment for participation in May 2020! Follow our Instagram for updates!cybersecuritychallengeRSAConferenceSingaporeInstituteofTechnology
cleaned_caption: If you've seen our post on the winner of CIC 2019, here's a participant giving us an update and sharing his experience on attending the RSA Conference 2020 in San Francisco last week. Our future intern said he had an eye-opening and mind-blowing experience, gaining new perspectives on the current security challenges from the expert-led sessions and keynotes. He stated that it was like a step into the future with countless exhibitions, each showcasing cutting-edge technologies that are not on the market, and solutions that were previously thought impossible to create. Another highlight he mentioned was meeting some of the creators of RSA up close at the conference! The participant was thrilled to broaden his horizons by attending the physical workshops and trying car hacking and radio frequency (RF) hacking. He successfully manipulated the electronic devices in the car such as the speedometer, door locks, starting the car, and even deploying the airbags. He thoroughly enjoyed the hands-on experience of compromising a system, as such an attack was only theoretically taught in school. It appears that the all-expense-paid trip has been most rewarding for him. CIC 2020 is happening again on 13-14 July this year! For those interested to join, look out for more details of enrolment for participation in May 2020! Follow our Instagram for updates!
